tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Product (
	product_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	product_name TEXT,
	unique_identifier UUID,
	blockchain_record JSON
)

CREATE TABLE Manufacturer (
	manufacturer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	manufacturer_name TEXT,
	manufacturer_address TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Blockchain (
	blockchain_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	blockchain_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ProductAuthenticity (
	authenticity_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	product_id UUID,
	blockchain_id UUID,
	is_authentic BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE product_authenticity (
   product_id VARCHAR(50) PRIMARY KEY,
   blockchain_id VARCHAR(100) UNIQUE,
   authenticity_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
   transaction_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   blockchain_id VARCHAR(100) REFERENCES product_authenticity(blockchain_id),
   transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
   transaction_details TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE user_credentials (
   user_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   username VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
   password VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE product_history (
   history_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   product_id VARCHAR(50) REFERENCES product_authenticity(product_id),
   timestamp TIMESTAMP,
   action_taken VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE blockchain_nodes (
   node_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   node_name VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
   node_ip VARCHAR(50)
)
